column2: Ishtar's father, glorious Anu, gave her the Bull of Heaven to lead by the halter down to Uruk. When they reached the gates of Uruk the Bull went to the river. With his first snort cracks opened in the earth and, a hundred young men fell down to death. With his second snort cracks opened and two hundred fell down to death.
My friend, we boasted that we would leave enduring names behind us. Now thrust in your sword between the nape and the horns.
Forward, there is nothing to fear. We will kill the Bull of Heaven!
